languages.text: {n}Паскаль скорбно скрипит:{/n} "Груз ошибок в вычислениях варп-секстанта уничтожает хранилища данных. Подношение не умилостивило духа корабля... варп-двигатель не может быть преисполнен Движущей Силой. Мы в ловушке". {n}Спустя мгновение магос неуверенно продолжает.{/n} "Возможно, альтернативный ризийский протокол... или аварийный запуск дополнительных катушек..." {n}Техножрец склоняется над когитатором, но что-то в его позе и движениях выдает отчаяние.{/n}

{n}Pasqal mournfully grates out,{/n} "The mass of errors in the warp sextant's calculations is destroying the data repositories. The offering did not appease the ship's spirit... the warp engine cannot be filled with the Motive Force. We are trapped." {n}A moment later, the Magos continues uncertainly,{/n} "Perhaps, an alternative Ryzan protocol... or an emergency launch of the auxiliary coils..." {n}The Tech-Priest bends over the cogitator, but something in his pose and movements reveals his desperation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡绝望地喊了起来。{/n}“亚空间六分仪中的大量错误数据正在摧毁数据储存设备。那些祭品并没有成功地安抚飞船的机魂……无法向亚空间引擎注入源力，我们被困在这里了。”{n}过了片刻，帕斯卡犹豫不决地开了口。{/n}“或许替代的瑞扎协议能派上用场……或是启动紧急备用线圈……”{n}他弯下了腰，检查着沉思者，但他的姿势与动作却暴露了心中的绝望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal mournfully grates out,{/n} "The mass of errors in the warp sextant's calculations is destroying the data repositories. The offering did not appease the ship's spirit... the warp engine cannot be filled with the Motive Force. We are trapped." {n}A moment later, the Magos continues uncertainly,{/n} "Perhaps, an alternative Ryzan protocol... or an emergency launch of the auxiliary coils..." {n}The Tech-Priest bends over the cogitator, but something in his pose and movements reveals his desperation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡绝望地喊了起来。{/n}“亚空间六分仪中的大量错误数据正在摧毁数据储存设备。那些祭品并没有成功地安抚飞船的机魂……无法向亚空间引擎注入原初动力，我们被困在这里了。”{n}过了片刻，帕斯卡犹豫不决地开了口。{/n}“或许替代的瑞扎协议能派上用场……或是启动紧急备用线圈……”{n}他弯下了腰，检查着思考器，但他的姿势与动作却暴露了心中的绝望。{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは嘆いた。{/n}「ワープセクスタント計算の誤差の塊が、データ保管庫を破壊しているようです。供物が船の精霊をなだめることができません…すなわち、ワープエンジンに動力を充填することができないのです。我々は閉じ込められてしまった」{n}しばらくして、マゴスは不確かな言葉を続ける。{/n}「おそらく、代替のライザ・プロトコルか…補助コイルの緊急起動か…」{n}技術司祭は考算機にかがみ込むものの、その姿勢と動作には絶望感がにじんでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal mournfully grates out,{/n} "The mass of errors in the warp sextant's calculations is destroying the data repositories. The offering did not appease the ship's spirit... the warp engine cannot be filled with the Motive Force. We are trapped." {n}A moment later, the Magos continues uncertainly,{/n} "Perhaps, an alternative Ryzan protocol... or an emergency launch of the auxiliary coils..." {n}The Tech-Priest bends over the cogitator, but something in his pose and movements reveals his desperation.{/n}

{n}パスカルは嘆いた。{/n}「ワープセクスタント計算の誤差の塊が、データ保管庫を破壊しているようです。供物が船の精霊をなだめることができません…すなわち、ワープエンジンに動力を充填することができないのです。我々は閉じ込められてしまった」{n}しばらくして、マゴスは不確かな言葉を続ける。{/n}「おそらく、代替のライザ・プロトコルか…補助コイルの緊急起動か…」{n}技術司祭は考算機にかがみ込むものの、その姿勢と動作には絶望感がにじんでいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal sagt krächzend und bedauernd:{/n} "Die Menge der Fehler in den Berechnungen des Warp-Sextanten zerstört die Datenspeicher. Das Opfer hat den Geist des Schiffs nicht besänftigt ... das Warp-Triebwerk kann nicht mit Antriebskraft gefüllt werden. Wir sitzen in der Falle." {n}Einen Augenblick später fährt der Magos unsicher fort:{/n} "Vielleicht könnte ein alternatives Ryza-Protokoll ... oder ein Notfallstart der Hilfsspulen ..." {n}Der Techpriester beugt sich über den Cogitator, aber etwas in seiner Haltung und seinen Bewegungen verrät seine Verzweiflung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal mournfully grates out,{/n} "The mass of errors in the warp sextant's calculations is destroying the data repositories. The offering did not appease the ship's spirit... the warp engine cannot be filled with the Motive Force. We are trapped." {n}A moment later, the Magos continues uncertainly,{/n} "Perhaps, an alternative Ryzan protocol... or an emergency launch of the auxiliary coils..." {n}The Tech-Priest bends over the cogitator, but something in his pose and movements reveals his desperation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sagt krächzend und bedauernd:{/n} "Die Menge der Fehler in den Berechnungen des Warp-Sextanten zerstört die Datenspeicher. Das Opfer hat den Geist des Schiffs nicht besänftigt ... das Warp-Triebwerk kann nicht mit Antriebskraft gefüllt werden. Wir sitzen in der Falle." {n}Einen Augenblick später fährt der Magos unsicher fort:{/n} "Vielleicht könnte ein alternatives Ryza-Protokoll ... oder ein Notfallstart der Hilfsspulen ..." {n}Der Techpriester beugt sich über den Cogitator, aber etwas in seiner Haltung und seinen Bewegungen verrät seine Verzweiflung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se désole :{/n} « L'amoncellement d'erreurs dans les calculs du sextant Warp est en train de détruire les archives de données. L'offrande n'est pas parvenue à apaiser l'esprit du vaisseau... il est impossible de libérer la Force Motrice dans le moteur Warp. Nous sommes coincés. » {n}Quelques instants plus tard, le magos poursuit d'un air hésitant :{/n} « Peut-être qu'un protocole de Ryzan alternatif... Ou un déploiement d'urgence des bobines auxiliaires... »{n}Le technoprêtre se penche sur le cogitateur, mais sa posture et ses mouvements trahissent son désarroi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal mournfully grates out,{/n} "The mass of errors in the warp sextant's calculations is destroying the data repositories. The offering did not appease the ship's spirit... the warp engine cannot be filled with the Motive Force. We are trapped." {n}A moment later, the Magos continues uncertainly,{/n} "Perhaps, an alternative Ryzan protocol... or an emergency launch of the auxiliary coils..." {n}The Tech-Priest bends over the cogitator, but something in his pose and movements reveals his desperation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se désole :{/n} « L'amoncellement d'erreurs dans les calculs du sextant Warp est en train de détruire les archives de données. L'offrande n'est pas parvenue à apaiser l'esprit du vaisseau... il est impossible de libérer la Force Motrice dans le moteur Warp. Nous sommes coincés. » {n}Quelques instants plus tard, le magos poursuit d'un air hésitant :{/n} « Peut-être qu'un protocole de Ryzan alternatif... Ou un déploiement d'urgence des bobines auxiliaires... »{n}Le technoprêtre se penche sur le cogitateur, mais sa posture et ses mouvements trahissent son désarroi.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con un chirrido apenado, Pasqal explica:{/n} «La masa de errores en los cálculos del sextante de la disformidad está destruyendo los repositorios de datos. La ofrenda no ha apaciguado al espíritu máquina... el motor de disformidad no puede llenarse de Fuerza Motriz. Estamos atrapados». {n}Un momento después, el magos continúa, titubeante.{/n} «Tal vez, con un protocolo Ryzan alternativo... o un lanzamiento de emergencia de las bobinas auxiliares...». {n}El tecnosacerdote se inclina sobre el cogitador, pero algo en su pose y sus movimientos revela su desesperación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal mournfully grates out,{/n} "The mass of errors in the warp sextant's calculations is destroying the data repositories. The offering did not appease the ship's spirit... the warp engine cannot be filled with the Motive Force. We are trapped." {n}A moment later, the Magos continues uncertainly,{/n} "Perhaps, an alternative Ryzan protocol... or an emergency launch of the auxiliary coils..." {n}The Tech-Priest bends over the cogitator, but something in his pose and movements reveals his desperation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un chirrido apenado, Pasqal explica:{/n} «La masa de errores en los cálculos del sextante de la disformidad está destruyendo los repositorios de datos. La ofrenda no ha apaciguado al espíritu máquina... el motor de disformidad no puede llenarse de Fuerza Motriz. Estamos atrapados». {n}Un momento después, el magos continúa, titubeante.{/n} «Tal vez, con un protocolo Ryzan alternativo... o un lanzamiento de emergencia de las bobinas auxiliares...». {n}El tecnosacerdote se inclina sobre el cogitador, pero algo en su pose y sus movimientos revela su desesperación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan çıkan sesi yaslı ve gıcırtılı.{/n} "Öteboyut sekstantının hesaplamalarındaki hata yığını, veri belleklerini yok ediyor. Adak, geminin ruhunu hoşnut kılmadı. Öteboyut motoru Devinim Gücü ile doldurulamıyor. Kapana kısıldık." {n}Kısa bir duraklamanın ardından Magos tereddütle devam ediyor.{/n} "Belki alternatif bir Ryza protokolü veya yardımcı bobinlerin acil durum aktivasyonu..." {n}Tekno Rahip, kavramsayara doğru eğiliyor ancak duruşundaki veya hareketlerindeki bir şey umutsuzluğunu ele veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal mournfully grates out,{/n} "The mass of errors in the warp sextant's calculations is destroying the data repositories. The offering did not appease the ship's spirit... the warp engine cannot be filled with the Motive Force. We are trapped." {n}A moment later, the Magos continues uncertainly,{/n} "Perhaps, an alternative Ryzan protocol... or an emergency launch of the auxiliary coils..." {n}The Tech-Priest bends over the cogitator, but something in his pose and movements reveals his desperation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal matemli bir şekilde gıcırdıyor.{/n} "Öteboyut sekstantının hesaplamalarındaki hata yığını, veri belleklerini yok ediyor. Adak, geminin ruhunu hoşnut kılmadı. Öteboyut motoru Devinim Gücü ile doldurulamıyor. Kapana kısıldık." {n}Kısa bir duraklamanın ardından Magos kararsızlıkla devam ediyor:{/n} "Belki alternatif bir Ryza protokolü veya harici bobinlerin acil durum aktivasyonu..." {n}Tekno Rahip kavramsayara doğru eğiliyor ancak duruşundan ve hareketlerinden umutsuzluğa kapıldığı açıkça belli.{/n}
